selections.name: Tomoe Gozen
selections.reason: Finished a strong 2nd over this track and distance on Jan 15. The clear form choice in a weak field.

selections.name: L'alta Rocca
selections.reason: Drops into a winnable spot; showed early speed in previous starts and Crastus rides.

selections.name: Zakyala
selections.reason: Lightly raced, potential for improvement in this lower class handicap.

danger_horse.name: Saint Laurent
danger_horse.reason: Consistent enough to hit the board in this company.

selections.name: Dorianello
selections.reason: In excellent form with a win and a 3rd in last two starts. Proven at this level and surface.

selections.name: Absolute
selections.reason: Demuro takes the mount; consistent runner who fits well here.

selections.name: Nova Hope
selections.reason: Grandin rides; dropping in class could wake this one up.

danger_horse.name: Hurricane
danger_horse.reason: Capable of a closing run if the pace is hot.

selections.name: Ocra
selections.reason: Runner-up last time out at Pau; consistent form cycle suggests a big effort.

selections.name: Maximilien
selections.reason: Winner two starts back; maintains good form and draws well.

selections.name: Soleil Suisse
selections.reason: 3rd recently over 6.5f; stretching out slightly but has the rail.

selections.name: Si Capo Si
selections.reason: Massive value play. Finished 2nd by a head to Monsieurvalchop last time but now carries 12 lbs less (120 vs 132). The weight swing is decisive.

selections.name: Monsieurvalchop
selections.reason: Won the key reference race but faces a significant weight penalty.

selections.name: Pink Valentine
selections.reason: 3rd in the same key race; consistent and carries light weight.

danger_horse.name: Hy Dream
danger_horse.reason: Capable of hitting the board on best form.

selections.name: Ivory Spring
selections.reason: Won impressively last out over this track/trip. Form is peaking.

selections.name: Scarface
selections.reason: 3rd behind Ivory Spring last time; consistent placer.

selections.name: Wonder Boy
selections.reason: Veteran runner who is always dangerous at this level; 2nd recently.

selections.name: Bawe Island
selections.reason: Value Play. Beat the favorite (Logis) last time out on Jan 17. Offered at better odds (9/1) despite that victory.

selections.name: Logis
selections.reason: 2nd to Bawe Island last time; consistent turf performer.

selections.name: Polo Baby
selections.reason: 3rd in the same key race; Hardouin rides.

danger_horse.name: Silver Schnok
danger_horse.reason: 4th in the key race; not far off.

selections.name: Sleepy Suzy
selections.reason: 2nd last time out on heavy turf; handles conditions well and Demuro rides.

selections.name: For Win
selections.reason: Winner two starts back; solid form.

selections.name: Ektoria
selections.reason: 3rd behind Sleepy Suzy recently; consistent.

selections.name: Saint Hellier
selections.reason: 2nd last out in a similar handicap. Consistent and looks ready to win.

selections.name: Bosioh
selections.reason: 3rd behind Saint Hellier last time; Ruis rides.

selections.name: Bluff
selections.reason: 4th in the key reference race; Pasquier aboard.

selections.name: Go Love
selections.reason: Won last time out (Jan 14) at 10/1. Remains at a fair price and holds top form.

selections.name: Sous Influence
selections.reason: 2nd recently; consistent placer at this level.

selections.name: Paco
selections.reason: 2nd last out; in good form cycle.
